articles.title: Paula Abdul sues Nigel Lythgoe over alleged sexual assault - US media - BBC.com
articles.description: The American singer alleges multiple instances of assault while the pair worked together.
articles.content:
By Jacqueline HowardBBC News
Ms Abdul (bottom right) claims that Mr Lythgoe (top left) first assaulted her during an early season of American Idol

articles.author: Ethan Millman
articles.title: Paula Abdul Sues American Idol Producer Nigel Lythgoe Over Sexual Assault Claims - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Paula Abdul sued former American Idol producer Nigel Lythgoe in Los Angeles, alleging that he sexually assaulted her multiple times.
articles.content: Paula Abdul has sued former American Idol and So You Think You Can Dance producer Nigel Lythgoe and the show’s production companies, alleging that Lythgoe sexually assaulted her multiple times while … [+4240 chars]
